def catch_sign_change(lst):
    return sum( (x >= 0) != (y >= 0) for x, y in zip(lst, lst[1:]) )

def catch_sign_change(lst):
    return sum( (a or 1)*(b or 1) < 0 for a,b in zip(lst, lst[1:]))

def catch_sign_change(lst):
    return sum((m < 0) == (n > -1) for m, n in zip(lst, lst[1:]))

def catch_sign_change(lst):
    return sum((a<0)!=(b<0) for a,b in zip(lst,lst[1:]))

def catch_sign_change(lst):
    return sum(1 for (a, b) in zip(lst, lst[1:]) if (a < 0) != (b < 0))
